name: Finley
headline: Streamline your debt capital raise and management
description: Finley simplifies debt capital raise and management. Our software helps companies like Ramp, Arc and Parafin automate due diligence, ensure compliance, and streamline ongoing reporting with their capital providers. Our team brings experience from Goldman Sachs, Nova Credit, and Palantir Technologies, and is backed by Y Combinator and Bain Capital Ventures.

founders.name: Jeremy Tsui, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder & CEO of Finley, previously at Goldman Sachs.

founders.name: Kevin Suh, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder of Finley, previously first engineer @ Nova Credit.

founders.name: Josiah Tsui, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder of Finley. Previously at Ironclad & Palantir.

# Debt Capital, Simplified
Take control of your debt capital with Finley, the software that top borrowers and asset managers rely on to streamline funding, verification, and analysis.
[Schedule a demo](https://www.finleycms.com/</contact>)[Explore the product![Right arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/6630252fd9eb86eb14063d21_icon-arrow-right.svg)![Right arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/6630252fd9eb86eb14063d21_icon-arrow-right.svg)](https://www.finleycms.com/</platform/overview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/66fa30f6e82c283b40663304_valleyLogo2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/66fa2f6e2ffcafcbe470e7b0_rampLogo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/66fac0203669b1be20f27c8c_channelLogo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/66fa2fbbedfc575e36fa4bd2_navanLogo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/66fa2fa9fbb87998923b8953_parafinLogo.png)
Finley's software helps everyone in the debt capital ecosystem, from corporate borrowers and issuers to credit funds and banks. 
Borrowers and issuers
Automate debt capital operations, monitor your collateral trends, and maximize your capital availability with Finley's asset-backed lending software.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/6664d2394858b3d06a77fa75_funding_overview.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/6664d1524858b3d06a777296_funding_request_sliders.png)
Private credit funds 
Manage funding, data, and risk across your portfolio of borrowers with Finley's calculation and verification suite.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/6750f74cd3747e07615a4891_exposureByMonthlyVintage.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/6750f010f60177b38bcaf631_borrowingBaseByType.png)
Banks
Automate, monitor, and safeguard your debt capital portfolio while ensuring an optimal experience for your corporate borrowers and integrating with your core systems. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/6750f0a3e8460f34e6013993_Screenshot%202024-12-04%20at%204.12.09%E2%80%AFPM.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/66665cce12bbefd146c203d0_eventLog.png)
Finley's software helps you automate, track, and maximize the potential of your debt capital. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/6630252fd9eb86eb14063c68_icon-calendar.svg)
Centralize your credit agreement and asset data
Master the details of your entire portfolio. Quickly see key credit terms and conditions in Finley. Verify and analyze asset data in near real time. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/6630252fd9eb86eb14063c73_icon-warehouse.svg)
Streamline capital markets operations
Review and execute funding requests with a few clicks. Maintain a centralized log of user activity, facility usage, and interest calculations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/6630252fd9eb86eb14063c88_icon-layers.svg)
Knowledge management
Never miss an update or lose track of a deliverable. Comment on deliverables and transactions. Build and maintain a comprehensive document repository.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/666cc31cabb9cd387b007814_icons8-positive-dynamic%20\(1\).svg)
Analytics and alerting
Manage your portfolio proactively. Receive e-mail and Slack alerts when credit facility KPIs exceed predefined thresholds.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/666cb0695dc33a7869915d1f_bw-people.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/6630252fd9eb86eb14063c72_icon-earth.svg)
$20 billion
In debt capital actively managed by Finley's software
90%
Time savings from executing common workflows like submitting or reviewing draw requests
200+
Credit agreement fields digitized and stored in Finley's database for Asset Performance, Covenant, and Deliverable tracking
15+ 
Bank Data, Data Warehouse, Loan Origination System, and Loan Management System integrations supported
Watch a 1-Minute Product Overview
View a 1-minute video walkthrough of Finley's key Borrower capabilities, including the Digital Credit Agreement, Funding Requests, and Insights.
Customers
[![Coast](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063c55/6668bcd4758cbaee7e81de25_pexels-quintingellar-2199293%20\(1\).jpg)![Coast](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063c55/6668bc0bece141b2f57ea62b_coast-logo-white.png)](https://www.finleycms.com/</customer/coast>)[How Finley Helps Coast Save Time and Build Trust](https://www.finleycms.com/</customer/coast>)[Read customer story](https://www.finleycms.com/</customer/coast>)
[![Navan](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063c55/6632c27b91672077e616ce0f_pexels-magic-k-24827758-6726195.jpg)![Navan](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063c55/6632c2164fcf04d006e16d68_navan-logo-white.png)](https://www.finleycms.com/</customer/navan>)[How Navan (TripActions) uses Finley to manage its $300 million credit facility](https://www.finleycms.com/</customer/navan>)[Read customer story](https://www.finleycms.com/</customer/navan>)
Customer Spotlight
“When we looked for off-the-shelf software solutions that could meet our needs, we couldn’t find one that could handle the nuances of our credit agreement. Finley helps us minimize risk and saves our finance and engineering teams dozens of hours a month.”
Eric Glyman
Chief Executive Officer, Ramp
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/663169afae88354aed59e747_ramp-founders.jpeg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630252fd9eb86eb14063bf2/6631696ed67f524f5611543e_logo-ramp-white.png)

January 23, 2025

generated_description:
### Finley Summary

**Company Overview:**
Finley is a fintech startup founded in 2021, operating out of San Francisco and part of the Y Combinator W21 batch. With a mission to streamline debt capital raising and management, they provide software solutions that help companies like Ramp, Arc, and Parafin automate complex operations.

**The Team:**
Backed by renowned partners such as Y Combinator and Bain Capital Ventures, Finley's team comprises 32 skilled professionals, many of whom have experience from top-tier firms like Goldman Sachs, Nova Credit, and Palantir Technologies. Dalton Caldwell serves as the Group Partner.

**Product Features:**
Finley's platform is equipped with comprehensive features aimed at various players in the debt capital ecosystem, including borrowers, issuers, credit funds, and banks. Key functionalities include:
- **Asset Verification**: Ensuring the correct evaluation of assets.
- **Calculation Verification**: Automating complex financial calculations.
- **Portfolio Analytics**: Providing insights into portfolio performance.
- **Funding Automation**: Streamlining the funding process and enhancing efficiency.

Overall, their software helps businesses automate due diligence, ensure compliance, and maintain ongoing reporting with capital providers, saving up to 90% in time on typical workflows.

**Market Position:**
Finley operates at the intersection of fintech and SaaS, with a strong emphasis on enterprise solutions aimed at managing debt capital. The company is currently managing approximately $20 billion in debt capital through its software.

**Customer Impact:**
Their solutions have received positive feedback, with clients like Ramp highlighting significant time savings and risk mitigation achieved through Finley's tailored tools.

**Visit Us:**
You can explore more about Finley and its offerings at [finleycms.com](https://www.finleycms.com).

**Conclusion:**
Finley is positioning itself as a pivotal player in the fintech space, simplifying complex processes in debt capital management. By leveraging technology, they enable companies to operate more efficiently and effectively, potentially reshaping how businesses interact with their financial ecosystems.
